name: The deepest local experience - getting around Hanoi by motorbike!! Why not?!
description:
Have you heard about Hanoi's traffic? Do they say it's dangerous, crazy, blah blah... Come on, you don't pass thousands miles just to watch it, do you? Let's get a ride and we are going to discover the smallest alleys, the most popular street foods, and many corners of Hanoi that most tourists never know. 
Finally, you're in Nam, so let's do it! :-)
